name: Jogo de Dentro Jogo De Fora
lyrics:
Jogo de dentro, jogo de fora 
Joga bonito no jogo de Angola
Jogo de dentro, jogo de fora
Valha me Deus, minha Nossa Senhora
Jogo de dentro, jogo de fora

translations.text:
Inside game, outside game
Play beautiful in the game of Angola
Inside game, outside game
Protect me my Lord, Our Lady
Inside game, outside game

descriptions.text: This song is a reminder to play "inside" (towards the opponent) as well as "outside" (backing away). Frequently a beginner will back away most of the time, but surprising things happen when one goes into an attack
